name: PUZZLE: OCEAN
description: PUZZLE: OCEAN - a logical game in which your task is to collect puzzles and get a picture of different marine fauna.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7,8,10 Processor: 2.0 GHz CPU Dual Core Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: Use headphones for better experience!
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7,8,10 Processor: Core i3 or higher Memory: 4096 MB RAM Graphics: 1 GB Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: Use headphones for better experience!
